content: round 1 single_crochet in 1st chain make sure not to twist with light blue the beginning chain single_crochet in each of the round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring remaining chain 24 round 2 increase around 12 round 2 2 single_crochet decrease repeat around 18 round 3 single_crochet increase repeat around 18 round 3 single_crochet decrease repeat around 12 round 4 2 single_crochet increase repeat around 24 round 4 6 single_crochet around 12  do not fo put cup and base with wrong round 7 single_crochet increase repeat around 18 sides together turn and single_crochet around from the round 8 2 single_crochet increase repeat around 24 cup side through both layers fo weave in round 9 3 single_crochet increase repeat around 30 loose ends round 10 single_crochet around 30 round 11 4 single_crochet increase repeat around 36 finishing round 12 14 single_crochet around 36 fo weave in loose ends attach craft eyes to magic_ring eggcup embroider faces sew a ribbon/flower to mrs egghead s head and make cheeks with pink powder voila your tiny couple is finished enjoy free crochet pattern for personal use you may not share translate copy or publish this pattern for private use only no commercial use
